reviews.review_msg: I had 311 and 411 with her. Amazing prof all the way.  Very nice, thorough, patient when explaining even to idiots like me.  The labs are interesting and not terribly stressful.  She's also very sweet as a person.  Highly recommended course and prof.

Excellent professor. He lectures in an articulate, clear, and engaging way. He explains complex ideas and concepts in simple and understandable manner. I will definately try and get into another class that he is teaching.
